local_intent: Align tool to the T-block and execute a rightward 0.2m push, then settle and retreat.
assumptions: Safe clearance to approach the block from above/side
coherence_with_global: Matches the global push phase: retry perception of the block, align with 0.01 tolerance, set yaw 0, push distance 0.2 toward 0 deg, wait 400 ms, then retreat 0.1 m.
